mapper.select: select m.menu_id as menuId, m.menu_name as menuName, m.note as note FROM hrbp_menu m order by m.order_num
SELECT m.menu_id as menuId, m.menu_name as menuName, m.note as note FROM hrbp_menu m left join hrbp_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = '${_parameter}' order by m.order_num

SELECT m.menu_id as menuId, m.menu_name as menuName, m.note as note FROM hrbp_menu m left join hrbp_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join hrbp_role hr on rm.role_id = hr.role_id left join login_information li on hr.role_id = li.role_id where li.employee_ID = #{employeeID}
